page.title: 13Winterborne Monkton-firms
page.content: Mrs Sue Arnell runs a dog grooming service in Winterborne Monkton. "Dogsbody", as it is called, is a shed at the back of the house. She clips,bathes and grooms all breeds of dogs and some cats. The equipment consists of clippers, driers, brushes, combs, nail clippers and teeth scalers. The dogs are usually brought to the house but there is a collection and delivery service available. All dogs coming to Dogsbody are bathed, clipped and groomed. Nails are cut, ears cleaned, and teeth scaled. The business was started in March 1985,although Sue learnt poodle clipping when training to be a R.A.N.A Animal Registered Nursing Auxillary when she left school.
